column1: The Purple Pig////Went here with a reservation and had a great time. At first glance
column2: it was a bit confusing because the restaurant is located inside another building
column3: but we managed to find it. Ordered many things to try the menu and my favorite was the Pork Tongue. My dad ordered it on a whim and boy was it worth it!! Definitely will be returning when back in town
column4: especially after learning they are switching to 'reservations needed' after it worked out so well during COVID.
